00034 namespace loos {
00035 
00036   // GROMACS magic constants...
00037   const int TRR::magic = 1993;
00038   const int TRR::DIM = 3;
00039 
00040 
00041   // GROMACS voodoo to determine precision of stored data...
00042   int TRR::floatSize(Header& hdr) {
00043     int i;
00044 
00045     if (hdr.box_size)
00046       i = hdr.box_size/(DIM*DIM);
00047     else if (hdr.x_size)
00048       i = hdr.x_size/(hdr.natoms * DIM);
00049     else if (hdr.v_size)
00050       i = hdr.v_size/(hdr.natoms * DIM);
00051     else if (hdr.f_size)
00052       i = hdr.f_size/(hdr.natoms * DIM);
00053     else
00054       throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot determine float size"));
00055 
00056     if (i != sizeof(float) && i != sizeof(double))
00057       throw(std::runtime_error("Float size does not match native sizes"));
00058 
00059     return(i);
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063   bool TRR::readHeader(Header& hdr) {
00064     int magic_no;
00065 
00066     xdr_file.read(magic_no);
00067     if ((xdr_file.get())->eof())
00068       return(false);
00069 
00070     if (magic_no != magic)
00071       throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid TRR magic number"));
00072 
00073     std::string version;
00074     xdr_file.read(version);
00075     xdr_file.read(hdr.ir_size);
00076     xdr_file.read(hdr.e_size);
00077     xdr_file.read(hdr.box_size);
00078     xdr_file.read(hdr.vir_size);
00079     xdr_file.read(hdr.pres_size);
00080     xdr_file.read(hdr.top_size);
00081     xdr_file.read(hdr.sym_size);
00082     xdr_file.read(hdr.x_size);
00083     xdr_file.read(hdr.v_size);
00084     xdr_file.read(hdr.f_size);
00085     xdr_file.read(hdr.natoms);
00086     
00087     int flsz = floatSize(hdr);
00088     hdr.bDouble = (flsz == sizeof(double));
00089 
00090     xdr_file.read(hdr.step);
00091     xdr_file.read(hdr.nre);
00092 
00093     if (hdr.bDouble) {
00094       xdr_file.read(hdr.td);
00095       hdr.tf = hdr.td;
00096       xdr_file.read(hdr.lambdad);
00097       hdr.lambdaf = hdr.lambdad;
00098     } else {
00099       xdr_file.read(hdr.tf);
00100       hdr.td = hdr.tf;
00101       xdr_file.read(hdr.lambdaf);
00102       hdr.lambdad = hdr.lambdaf;
00103     }
00104 
00105     if ((xdr_file.get())->fail())
00106       throw(std::runtime_error("Error reading TRR header"));
00107 
00108     return(true);
00109   }
00110 
00111 
00112   // Initialize the object, along with scanning file for frames to
00113   // build the frame index, and finally caches the first frame.
00114   void TRR::init(void) {
00115     Header h;
00116 
00117     // Since the trajectory can have different number of atoms per
00118     // frame, we track the max and then reserve that space...
00119     int maxatoms = 0;
00120 
00121     rewindImpl();
00122     frame_indices.clear();
00123     
00124     size_t frame_start = (xdr_file.get())->tellg();
00125     while (readHeader(h)) {
00126       frame_indices.push_back(frame_start);
00127       if (h.natoms > maxatoms)
00128         maxatoms = h.natoms;
00129 
00130       uint b = sizeof(internal::XDR::block_type);
00131 
00132       size_t offset = (h.box_size ? DIM*DIM*b : 0) + (h.vir_size ? DIM*DIM*b : 0)
00133         + (h.pres_size ? DIM*DIM*b : 0) + (h.x_size ? h.natoms*DIM*b : 0)
00134         + (h.v_size ? h.natoms*DIM*b : 0) + (h.f_size ? h.natoms*DIM*b : 0);
00135 
00136       (xdr_file.get())->seekg(offset, std::ios_base::cur);
00137       frame_start = (xdr_file.get())->tellg();
00138     }
00139 
00140     coords_.reserve(maxatoms);
00141     velo_.reserve(maxatoms);
00142     forc_.reserve(maxatoms);
00143 
00144     rewindImpl();
00145     parseFrame();
00146     cached_first = true;
00147   }
00148 
00149   void TRR::updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup& g) {
00150     int natoms = g.size();
00151 
00152     for (AtomicGroup::iterator i = g.begin(); i != g.end(); ++i) {
00153       int idx = (*i)->id()-1;
00154       if (idx < 0 || idx > natoms)
00155         throw(std::runtime_error("atom index into trajectory frame is out of range"));
00156       (*i)->coords(coords_[idx]);
00157     }
00158 
00159     if (hdr_.box_size)
00160       g.periodicBox(box);
00161   }
00162 
00163   void TRR::seekFrameImpl(uint i) {
00164     if (i >= frame_indices.size())
00165       throw(std::runtime_error("Trying to seek past the end of the file"));
00166     
00167     ifs()->clear();
00168     ifs()->seekg(frame_indices[i], std::ios_base::beg);
00169   }
